stories.title: Project initialization
stories.description: Set up Next.js 16 project with TypeScript, Tailwind v4, shadcn/ui, Biome, and SQLite database foundation
acceptance: Next.js 16 app created using: bunx create-next-app@latest app --ts --tailwind --eslint --app --src-dir --use-bun --yes
Biome setup: cd app && bun add -d @biomejs/biome && bunx @biomejs/biome init
Tailwind v4 configured with CSS-first configuration
shadcn/ui initialized with bunx shadcn@latest init using New York style and neutral base color
better-sqlite3 installed and database connection utility created
Database schema defined with tables: ideas, saved_ideas, completed_dates
Global CSS includes prefers-color-scheme media queries for automatic light/dark mode
Typography scale uses clamp() for fluid sizing (e.g., clamp(2rem, 10vw, 6rem) for headlines)
Base layout is mobile-first with no horizontal overflow
Whimsical sans-serif font loaded (e.g., DM Sans or Plus Jakarta Sans)

stories.title: Date idea database seeding
stories.description: Populate the database with curated date night ideas across all categories
acceptance: Minimum 40 date ideas seeded across 4 categories: romantic, adventure, cozy, free
Each idea has: id, title, description, category, estimated_cost, duration_minutes
Ideas are diverse and inclusive of different relationship types and budgets
Seed script is idempotent (can run multiple times without duplicates)
API route GET /api/ideas/random returns a random unseeded idea
API route respects optional category query parameter for filtering

stories.title: Swipe card interface
stories.description: Build the core swipe interaction for browsing date ideas
acceptance: Single card displayed centered on screen with idea title and description
Card uses 80vh height on mobile for immersive feel
Swipe right gesture saves idea (visual feedback: card exits right with green tint)
Swipe left gesture skips idea (visual feedback: card exits left with subtle fade)
Touch gestures work smoothly on iOS and Android browsers
Fallback buttons for save/skip visible below card for accessibility
Card stack shows subtle preview of next card behind current
Typography: title uses clamp(1.5rem, 8vw, 3rem), description uses clamp(1rem, 4vw, 1.25rem)
Borderless card design with generous whitespace, no visible card borders or shadows in light mode

stories.title: Saved ideas collection
stories.description: View and manage saved date ideas for future use
acceptance: Bottom navigation tab or swipe-up gesture reveals saved ideas list
Saved ideas displayed as minimal list with title and category tag
Tap on saved idea expands to show full description
Swipe left on saved idea removes it from collection (with undo toast)
Long press or tap action to mark idea as 'completed' moves it to history
Empty state shows encouraging message with spark emoji
List uses virtualization if more than 20 items for performance
API routes: GET /api/saved, POST /api/saved, DELETE /api/saved/:id

stories.title: Category filtering
stories.description: Allow users to filter date ideas by category preference
acceptance: Horizontal pill toggles at top of swipe screen for: All, Romantic, Adventure, Cozy, Free
Pills use subtle background color coding per category
Multiple categories can be selected simultaneously
Filter state persists in localStorage across sessions
Swipe cards only show ideas matching active filters
If no ideas match filters, show friendly empty state with suggestion to expand filters
Filter changes trigger smooth card transition animation
Pills are scrollable horizontally if screen is narrow

stories.title: Completed dates history
stories.description: Track and celebrate completed date nights
acceptance: Separate tab/view for completed dates with completion timestamp
Each completed date shows: idea title, category, date completed
Optional: add personal note or rating (1-5 sparks) when marking complete
History sorted by most recent first
Simple stats at top: total dates completed, streak counter for weekly dates
Ability to 'redo' a completed date (adds back to saved without removing from history)
API routes: GET /api/history, POST /api/history, PATCH /api/history/:id
Empty history state encourages user to complete their first date

stories.title: Micro-interactions and polish
stories.description: Add delightful animations that enhance the whimsical feel
acceptance: Card swipe uses spring physics for natural feel (not linear easing)
Spark/confetti burst animation when saving an idea
Subtle pulse animation on empty card stack prompting refresh
Tab transitions use shared element transitions where supported
Button presses have gentle scale feedback (0.97 transform)
Loading states use skeleton with subtle shimmer, no spinners
All animations respect prefers-reduced-motion media query
Page transitions feel native app-like (no full page reloads visible)

stories.title: Progressive web app and offline support
stories.description: Enable installation and basic offline functionality
acceptance: Valid web app manifest with Spark branding and theme colors
App is installable on iOS (Add to Home Screen) and Android
Service worker caches app shell and last 10 viewed ideas
Offline banner appears when connection lost, saved ideas still accessible
Saved ideas and history are stored in SQLite, synced when online
App icon is simple spark/flame symbol that works at all sizes
Splash screen matches app theme (no white flash on dark mode)
Standalone display mode hides browser chrome for immersive feel
